name: lambda-health-checker
description: A serverless solution for health checking of web services.

scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run zip
scripts.configure:pre: npm run build && serverless deploy --stage pre
scripts.configure:prod: npm run build && serverless deploy --stage prod
scripts.deploy:pre: npm run build && serverless deploy function -f checker --stage pre
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && serverless deploy function -f checker --stage prod

author: Daniel Arteaga
